content:
@Robert Scanlon How did you want us to troubleshoot/reach out for Inferno testing issues? We are seeing things like:

CapabilityStatement.rest[0].resource[1].searchParam[3].definition: URL value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/SearchParameter/Account-type' does not resolve,

Procedure.performed date is returning a DAR, but Inferno is reporting that as an error.
We are asking for all issues regarding program certification testing be put here: https://github.com/onc-healthit/inferno-program/issues
We also have the #inferno zulip channel
Procedure.performed.date populated with a DAR was logged here: https://github.com/onc-healthit/inferno-program/issues/143
